I am an Assistant Professor in quantitative biology at the [University of Manitoba](https://umanitoba.ca/). My current focus is on promoting resilient ecosystems in anthropogenically-modified landscapes, largely using readily available data. [More about me.](about.html)

If you are interested in collaboration or graduate/post-doc opportunities please see the "Opportunities" tab above. 

Email: allison.binley@umanitoba.ca (please also cc adb299@cornell.edu)
